forecast-period.text: Partly cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers. The chance of a thunderstorm this afternoon and evening, possibly severe. Winds northwest to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h tending southeast to southwesterly in the morning then tending east to southeasterly 20 to 30 km/h in the middle of the day. Daytime maximum temperatures in the low to mid 30s.
Low-Moderate
UV Alert from 8:30 am to 3:20 pm, UV Index predicted to reach 10 [Very High]

Cloudy. Medium (50%) chance of showers, most likely in the late morning and afternoon. The chance of a thunderstorm inland in the afternoon. Winds southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h. Overnight temperatures falling to between 17 and 21 with daytime temperatures reaching the mid to high 20s.
